__e: Look, I'm just trying to be a gentleman here. I came here to say that I am committed to my family, okay?
Yeah, you've matured, actually-- actually, in the last year or so quite good into a real proper lad, a real gentleman and a nice boy.
I resent that... I'm a gentleman. I wouldn't touch a hair on your head.
A gentleman... ..who loved his life... ..and carried a heart the size of his head within his chest.
I hope I am a gentleman and that I will always treat any woman with respect. -Enough!
